name: IBM Tech 2023
description: The new technical recognition program that recognizes IBM's premier technical contributors. This recognition is a testament to hard work throughout 2022 to drive innovation, transform culture and accelerate growth.

name: Entrepreneur Award - 2022
description: Awarded for the initiative of the consolidation of projects and code libraries by using React and React Native for our offerings.

name: Pratt Circle
description: Presented for graduating with honors or distinction

name: Outstanding Technical Achievement Award
description: Presented for the successful release of the IBM Aspera HTTP Gateway 2.0.

name: Outstanding Computer Science Graduate
description: Selected as the graduate studies outstanding student for 2013 graduating class.

name: Outstanding Computer Science Undergraduate
description: Selected as the undergraduate studies outstanding student for 2012 graduating class.

name: Excellence in Academics and Service to the School of Computing and Mathematics
description: Honored for providing outstanding service and research within the school of Computing and Mathematics during my undergraduate studies.
